content: No way are these Morels...not even close....keep foraging!!
Holy cow pie I cant believe you discovered truffles in Wisconsin!
Can you tell me where you found these? I've been looking for Hen of the Woods all over but havent been able to locate any...
There is no way that those are Hen of the Woods..
My mom has an amazing reciped for those that I will share with you if you would like!
